pages.text: The $(thing)Queen$() of the $(thing)Valkyries$() resides in the throne room of the $(thing)Silver Dungeons$() of the $(thing)Aether$(). A great warrior, the $(thing)Valkyrie Queen$() will only accept your challenge if you present her with 10 $(item)Victory Medals$() earned by defeating her $(thing)Valkyries$(). In battle, she fights similarly to the her $(thing)Valkyries$(), while also occasionally summoning $(thing)Thunder Balls$() to call lightning on opponents.

pages.name: Valkyrie Queen
pages.drop1: aether_legacy:dungeon_key:1{display: {Lore: ["Use to open the Treasure Chest in the Silver Dungeon"]}}
pages.drop2: minecraft:golden_sword{display: {Lore: ["Drops: 1", "Unaffected by Looting", "Unaffected by Cutting Skill"]}}
